info.title: Spike API
info.description: AI companion platform API - create personalities that see, listen, speak, remember, and play.

tags.name: Personalities
tags.description: Define AI personality, voice, and appearance

tags.name: Users
tags.description: Manage end users who interact with personalities

get.description: List all API keys for the authenticated organization. Secret keys are partially redacted.

post.description: Create a new API key. The full secret is only returned once at creation time.

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific API key.

patch.description: Update API key name or permissions.

delete.description: Permanently revoke an API key. This action cannot be undone.

get.description: List all personalities in the organization.

post.description: Create a new AI personality with voice, appearance, and behavioral traits.

get.description: Retrieve a specific personality by ID.

patch.description: Update an existing personality. Only provided fields are updated.

delete.description: Delete a personality and all associated knowledge base data. Active conversations using this personality will be terminated.

get.description: List all users in the organization.

post.description: Create a new user. Users represent the people interacting with your AI personalities.

409.description: User with this external_id already exists

get.description: Retrieve a specific user by ID.

delete.description: Delete a user and all associated memories and integration connections. This action cannot be undone.

get.description: Retrieve a user by your external identifier.
List all memories for a user, optionally filtered by personality.

post.description: Manually create a memory for a user-personality pair.

delete.description: Delete all memories for a user, optionally filtered by personality.

parameters.name: personality_id
parameters.description: Only delete memories for this personality

get.description: Retrieve a specific memory.

patch.description: Update a memory's content or category.

post.description: Semantic search across a user's memories.
Generate a chat response using a personality. Supports streaming via SSE.
Convert text to speech using a personality's voice configuration.
Generate a video of a personality speaking. This is an async operation - poll the returned ID for status.

get.description: List video generation jobs.
Get the status and result of a video generation job.

delete.description: Cancel a pending video generation job.

post.description: Generate an image from a text prompt.
Edit an existing image based on a prompt.

get.description: List all knowledge items for a personality.

post.description: Add a document, URL, or text to a personality's knowledge base.

get.description: Get details of a knowledge item.

delete.description: Remove a knowledge item from a personality's knowledge base.

post.description: Semantic search across a personality's knowledge base.
Start a new real-time conversation session. Returns connection details for WebRTC.

get.description: List conversation sessions.
Get conversation details including transcript.
List all games that personalities can play.

post.description: Start a new game session with a personality.

get.description: List game sessions.
Get game session details and state.

post.description: Submit a move in a game session. Returns the personality's response move.

get.description: List all webhook endpoints.
Get webhook details.
List connected third-party integrations for a user.

delete.description: Disconnect a third-party integration for a user.

ApiKeyAuth.description: API key authentication. Use your secret key (starts with `sk_`) as a Bearer token.
